job.title: Software Engineer - Early in Career
job.description: Join us as we pursue our disruptive new vision to make all machine data accessible usable and valuable to everyone We are a company filled with people who are passionate about our product and seek to deliver the best experience for our customers At Splunk were committed to our work customers having fun and most importantly to each others success Learn more about Splunk careers and how you can become a part of our journeybrbrSplunk is looking for a Software Engineer to join the Data Platform  Indexing teamsbrbrWe work on one of the vital core areas of Splunk  getting
